name: Humans are pattern finders
description:
TW: talks about psychosis, specifically delusions.

Use the mouse to join the dots(or stars, up to you), and the arrow keys to navigate around the map.  A game to remember where I've been and where I am, and hold the feeling I had when I came out of therapy and realised I might just be ok.

There's more I want to do and more I would change, but, I'm letting it go as it is.

Thank you for playing,  

Robin 

Lovely font by https://www.patreon.com/somepx (awesome font)

Chill Music by:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdSuKogXJOZld5Dzw_9285w (Prod.Riddiman, the track escapism)
